00001 using System;

00010 using System.Web.UI.HtmlControls;
00011 using PMTComponents;

00013 namespace PMT.Dev
00014 {
00018     public class Tasks : System.Web.UI.Page
00019     {
00020         protected System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid DataGrid1;
00021         protected System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button UpdateButton;
00022         protected System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button CancelButton;
00023         protected System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button CommitButton;
00024     
00025         private void Page_Load(object sender, System.EventArgs e)
00026         {
00027             //initialize the DB object
00028             DBDriver myDB=new DBDriver();
00029             //set the appropriate SQL query
00030             myDB.Query = "select t.ID as taskID, t.name as name, m.name as moduleName, p.name as projectName,\n"
00031                        + "t.actEndDate as actEndDate, t.complete as complete, a.dateAss as dateAss, a.devID, a.taskID\n"
00032                        + "from tasks t, assignments a, modules m, projects p\n" 
00033                        + "where t.ID = a.taskID and a.devID = @devID\n"
00034                        + "and t.moduleID = m.ID\n"
00035                        + "and m.projectID = p.ID\n"
00036                        + "order by p.name, m.name, t.name;";
00037             myDB.addParam("@devID", Request.Cookies["user"]["id"]);                   
00038 
00039             //initialize the dataset
00040             DataSet ds=new DataSet();
00041             //initialize the data adapter
00042             //fill the dataset;this is updated
00043             myDB.createAdapter().Fill(ds);
00044             //fill the display grid
00045             DataGrid1.DataSource=ds;
00046             if (!Page.IsPostBack)
00047                 DataGrid1.DataBind();
00048         }
00049

00052         {
00053             //
00054             // CODEGEN: This call is required by the ASP.NET Web Form Designer.
00055             //
00056             InitializeComponent();
00057             base.OnInit(e);
00058         }
00059         
00064         private void InitializeComponent()
00065         {    
00066             this.UpdateButton.Click += new System.EventHandler(this.UpdateButton_Click);
00067             this.CommitButton.Click += new System.EventHandler(this.CommitButton_Click);
00068             this.CancelButton.Click += new System.EventHandler(this.CancelButton_Click);
00069             this.Load += new System.EventHandler(this.Page_Load);
00070 
00071         }
00072         #endregion
00073 
00074         private void UpdateButton_Click(object sender, System.EventArgs e)
00075         {
00076             // show the complete column
00077             UpdateButton.Enabled = false;
00078             CommitButton.Enabled = true;
00079             CancelButton.Enabled = true;
00080             DataGrid1.Columns[6].Visible = true;
00081 
00082             // set check boxes to checked, not checked or checked and disabled
00083             foreach (DataGridItem item in DataGrid1.Items)
00084             {
00085                 CheckBox cb = (CheckBox)item.FindControl("CompleteCheckBox");
00086                 if (item.Cells[7].Text.Equals(TaskStatus.APPROVED))
00087                 {
00088                     cb.Checked = true;
00089                     cb.Enabled = false;
00090                 }
00091                 if (item.Cells[7].Text.Equals(TaskStatus.COMPLETE))
00092                 {
00093                     cb.Checked = true;
00094                 }
00095             }
00096         }
00097 
00098         private void CancelButton_Click(object sender, System.EventArgs e)
00099         {
00100             DataGrid1.Columns[6].Visible = false;
00101             UpdateButton.Enabled = true;
00102             CommitButton.Enabled = false;
00103             CancelButton.Enabled = false;
00104         }
00105 
00106         private void CommitButton_Click(object sender, System.EventArgs e)
00107         {
00108             DBDriver db = new DBDriver();
00109 
00110             foreach (DataGridItem itm in DataGrid1.Items)
00111             {
00112                 CheckBox cb = (CheckBox)itm.FindControl("CompleteCheckBox");
00113                 if(cb.Enabled)
00114                 {
00115                     db.Query = "update tasks set complete=@complete\n"
00116                         + "where id=@id;";
00117                     db.addParam("@complete", cb.Checked?TaskStatus.COMPLETE:TaskStatus.INPROGRESS);
00118                     db.addParam("@id", itm.Cells[0].Text);
00119                     db.nonQuery();
00120                 }
00121             }
00122             Server.Transfer(Request.Url.AbsolutePath);
00123         }
00124     }
00125 }
